title: VNotes
description: VNotes is a simple note application, with simple UI (user interface), the UI is very flexible and easy to navigate through screens. VNotes lets you create a note, read any note, edit any note and also delete any note you want to.
role: Developed the application from scratch as the sole developer responsible for all aspects of the project.
challenges_and_learnings: Maintaining a clean codebase and ensuring the application's performance. Move from using Provider for state management to using Bloc for state management, focused on separation of concerns and clean architecture.
